name: 蕭榮修
objective:
介紹嵌入式計算系統設計原理,使學生瞭解如何使用計算機軟、硬體
為元件來設計嵌入式計算系統。
1.嵌入式計算系統簡介
2.指令集
3.中央處理器
4.嵌入式計算平台
5.程式設計與分析
6.程序與作業系統
7.硬體加速器
8.網路與分散式嵌入式系統
9.系統設計方法
schedule:
Embedded Computing
1-2.     Introduction, Embedded System-on-Chip (SoC), Design Process
3-4.　　Embedded Hardware: Embedded Processors, Embedded Computing Platform
5-8.　　Embedded Software: Boot Loader, Device Drivers, Embedded OS, Middleware and Application Software
9.       Mid-term Exam
10-11.   Program Design and Analysis
12-14.　　Hardware Accelerators 
15-16.　　Network-Aware Systems
17.　　System Design Techniques
18.      Final Exam
scorePolicy:
1.　　Assignments (reading and lab reports): 50%
2.　　Mid-term Exam: 25%
3.　　Final Exam: 25%
materials:
1.　　Computers as Components: Principles of Embedded Computing, Wayne Wolf, Morgan Kaufmann Publishers, 2001. (以電腦為組件：嵌入式系統設計原理，蕭榮修譯，全華)
2.　　Embedded Systems: Architecture, Programming and Design, Raj Kamal, Tata McGraw Hill, 2003. (滄海) (嵌入式系統：結構、程式設計、系統設計，吳家榮譯，全華)
3. 嵌入式系統設計 ─ 以ARM處理器基礎之SOC平台，黃悅民等編著，滄海
4. 　　Embedded System Design -- A Unified Hardware/Software Introduction, Frank Vahid and Tony Givargis, John Wiley & Sons, 2002. (全華)
